name: ext_Benoit.Riandiere
scripts:
nb=1
nb=1
num=1
nb=1
num=1
for nb in $*
nb=1
num=1
for nb in $*
do 
nb=1
num=1
for nb in $*
do 
	eccho argument $num : $nb
nb=1
num=1
for nb in $*
do 
	eccho argument $num : $nb
	nb=nb+1
nb=1
num=1
for nb in $*
do 
	eccho argument $num : $nb
	nb=nb+1
	num=$((num+1))
nb=1
num=1
for nb in $*
do 
	eccho argument $num : $nb
	nb=nb+1
	num=$((num+1))
done
nb=1
num=1
for nb in $*
do 
	eccho argument $num : $nb
	nb=nb+1
	num=$((num+1))
done
echo il y a $# arguments.
